TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader extends System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader

Docs.summary: A class that wraps a specified reader and delegates all <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> calls to the wrapped reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The reader that is wrapped can be accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader.InnerReader%2A> property. Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader.InitializeInnerReader%2A> method to set the wrapped reader and initialize the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the number of attributes at the current reader position.
Docs.value: The number of attributes.

Docs.summary: Gets the base URI of the current node.
Docs.value: The base URI.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes the reader and changes the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> to Closed.
Gets the Depth of the current node.
Docs.value: The depth.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the reader is positioned at the end of the stream.
Docs.value: if the user is at the end of the stream; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetAttribute(int32 i) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the attribute. The index is 0 based index.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute at the given index.
Docs.returns: The value of the attribute at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method does not move the reader position.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetAttribute(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The qualified name of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute with the given name.
Docs.returns: The value of the attribute. If the attribute is not found null is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method does not move the reader position.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetAttribute (string name, string namespaceURI);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetAttribute(string name, string namespaceURI) cil managed

Docs.param: The local name of the attribute.
The namespace of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute with the given name and namespace Uri.
Docs.returns: The value of the attribute. If the attribute is not found null is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method does not move the reader.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current node can have a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A>.
Docs.value: if the current node can have a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A>; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InitializeInnerReader(class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader innerReader) cil managed

Docs.param: The reader that is to be wrapped by this instance.
Docs.summary: Initializes this instance with the specified inner reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader.InnerReader%2A> property to the reader specified by the `innerReader` parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets the inner reader that is wrapped by this instance.
Docs.value: The inner reader.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current node is an attribute that was generated from the default value defined in the DTD or Schema.
Docs.value: if the current node was generated from the default value; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current node is an empty element.
Docs.value: if the current node is an empty element; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public override string this[int i] { get; }

Docs.param: The index of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute with the specified index.
Docs.value: The attribute value at the specified index.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string this[string name] { get; }

Docs.param: The qualified name of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute with the specified name (as returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Name%2A> property from the wrapped reader).
Docs.value: The value of the specified attribute. If the attribute is not found, is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string this[string name, string namespaceURI] { get; }

Docs.param: The local name of the attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute with the specified local name and namespace URI (as returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.LocalName%2A> property and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.NamespaceURI%2A> property from the wrapped reader.
Docs.value: The value of the specified attribute. If the attribute is not found, is returned.

Docs.summary: Gets the local name of the current node.
Docs.value: The name of the current node with the prefix removed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string LookupNamespace(string prefix) cil managed

Docs.param: Prefix whose namespace Uri to be resolved.
Docs.summary: Resolves a namespace prefix in the current element scope.
Docs.returns: The namespace Uri to which the prefix matches or null if no matching prefix is found.

Docs.param: The index of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Moves to the attribute with the specified index.

Docs.param: The qualified name of the attribute.
Docs.summary: Moves to the attribute with the given local name.
Docs.returns: true if the attribute is found; otherwise, false.

The namespace URI of the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool MoveToElement() cil managed

Docs.summary: Moves to a node of type Element.
Docs.returns: true if the reader is positioned on an element else false

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool MoveToFirstAttribute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Moves to the first attribute.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the reader is positioned at a attribute else false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When returning false the reader position will not be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool MoveToNextAttribute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Moves the reader to the next attribute.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the reader is positioned at an attribute else false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When returning false the reader position will not be changed.

Docs.summary: Gets the qualified name of the current node.
Docs.value: The qualified name of the current node.

Docs.summary: Gets the namespace URI of the current node.
Docs.value: The namespace URI of the current node..

Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> associated with this instance.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> enabling you to get the atomized version of a string within the node.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the current node.
Docs.value: One of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> values representing the type of the current node.

Docs.summary: Gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
Docs.value: The namespace prefix associated with the current node.

Docs.summary: Gets the quotation mark character used to enclose the value of an attribute node. (" or ').
Docs.value: The quotation mark character (" or ') used to enclose the value of an attribute node.

Docs.summary: Reads the next node from the stream.
Docs.returns: true if the next node was read successfully.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ReadAttributeValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Parses the attribute value into one or more Text, EntityReference, or EndEntity nodes.
Docs.returns: true if there are nodes to return.false if the reader is not positioned on an attribute node when the initial call is made or if all the attribute values have been read.

The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.

Docs.summary: Reads the content and returns the contained string.
Gets the state of the reader.
Docs.value: One of the <xref:System.Xml.ReadState> values that specifies the state of the reader.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ReadValueChunk (char[] buffer, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ReadValueChunk(char[] buffer, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of characters that serves as the buffer to which the text contents are written. This value cannot be null.
The offset within the buffer where the System.Xml.XmlReader can start to copy the results.
The maximum number of characters to copy into the buffer. The actual number of characters copied is returned from this method.
Docs.summary: Reads large streams of text embedded in an XML document.
Docs.returns: The number of characters read into the buffer. The value zero is returned when there is no more text content.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ResolveEntity() cil managed

Docs.summary: Resolves the entity reference for EntityReference nodes.
Gets the text value of the current node.
Docs.value: The text value of the current node. For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property

Docs.summary: Gets the Common Language Runtime (CLR) type of the current node.
Docs.value: The CLR type that corresponds to the typed value of the node. The default is <xref:System.String>.

Docs.summary: Gets the scope.
Docs.value: The scope.

Docs.summary: Gets the current scope.
Docs.value: One of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> values. If no scope exists, this property defaults to <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>.
